markdownRemark.excerpt: After years of on and off work, Orbital Frame has been released to npm as an alpha! For full details, check out the GitHub repo and try an online demo!
markdownRemark.html:
After years of on and off work, Orbital Frame has been released to npm as an alpha!

For full details, check out the GitHub repo and try an online demo!

frontmatter.title: Introducing Orbital Frame
frontmatter.description: Unleash the power of UNIX in your chatbot!
